name: chronoframe
description: Chronoframe is a self-hosted time tracking and productivity tool designed to help users monitor how they spend their time across tasks. It features task categorization, analytics, and a web interface for easy management.

features.title: Time Tracking
features.description: Monitor how you spend time across tasks. Productivity insights

features.title: Task Categorization
features.description: Organize time by projects and categories. Smart organization

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Visualize time usage with charts and reports. Understand patterns

features.title: Productivity Tool
features.description: Improve time management and efficiency. Work smarter

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Track time from any browser. Accessible anywhere

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your time data completely private. Personal analytics
